Title: Winnie the Pooh: Seasons of Giving
Director: Jun Falkenstein, Karl Geurs, Gary Katona, Ed Wexler
Writer: Barbara Slade, Jimmy Danelli (story), Mark Zaslove (story), Carter Crocker (teleplay), Carter Crocker, Mark Zaslove (story), Larry Bernard (teleplay), Doug Hutchinson (teleplay), Mark Zaslove (teleplay)
Actors: Gregg Berger, Brady Bluhm, Jim Cummings, Scott Dreier
Plot: Join Pooh and his friends in three stories about the seasons.
